info.title: Bayut API
info.description:
Bayut API is a property finder API that allows you to search for real estate properties in the UAE by scraping data from Bayut's Website (https://bayut.com).

You can gather data related to properties, agencies, agents, developers, amenities, transactions, etc‚Ä¶

get.description:
Returns a list of locations (in UAE) for the given `query`.

- Supports pagination via the `page` parameter.
- Maximum results per page is 25.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string to match against location names.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for paginated results (starts from 0).

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of preferred language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: List of locations matching the search query.

name_ar.description: Arabic name of the location when langs=`ar`.

level.description: The granularity level of the location (e.g., country, city, community, sub_community, cluster, building, checkpoint).

full.description: The full hierarchy of this location (country ‚Üí city ‚Üí community ‚Üí sub_community ‚Üí cluster ‚Üí building ‚Üí checkpoint).

completion_status.description:
Development status for this location. Possible values:
  - ready (fully developed)
  - off_plan (under-construction/pre-construction)
  - mixed (partially developed)

count.description: Total number of matching locations on that page.

post.description: Returns a list of real estate properties in UAE filtered by purpose,  category, locations, price range, area, completion status, amenities, and more.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for paginated results (starts from 0).

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of preferred language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

locations_ids.description: Comma-separated list of location IDs to filter properties by service areas.

is_completed.description: Flag to filter properties based on their completion status (`under-construction` or `completed`).

is_furnished.description: Flag to filter properties based on furnishing status (`true` for furnished, `false` for unfurnished).

completion_percent_min.description: Minimum completion percentage of the properties under construction (applicable when `is_completed` is `false`).

completion_percent_max.description: Maximum completion percentage of the properties under construction (applicable when `is_completed` is `false`).

has_video.description: Flag to include (`true`) or exclude (`false`) properties with video tours. Don't use this parameter if it doesn't matter.

has_360_tour.description: Flag to include (`true`) or exclude (`false`) properties with 360¬∞ tours. Don't use this parameter if it doesn't matter.

has_floorplan.description: Flag to include (`true`) or exclude (`false`) properties with floor plans. Don't use this parameter if it doesn't matter.

amenities.description: List of desired amenities to filter properties.

area_min.description: Minimum area in sqft to filter properties.

area_max.description: Maximum area in sqft to filter properties.

sale_type.description: Type of off-plan sale (any, new, resale, by_developer).

200.description: Returns a list of properties matching the search criteria.

title.example: üí†Studio with Swimming Pool | üí†High Floor - üí†MODERN INTERIOR |üí† Investor Deal |üí† Pool View üí†| Resort-Style

is_furnished.description: Flag indicating if the property is furnished or unfurnished.

completion_status.description: Current construction status of the property - `under-construction` or `completed`.

start_date.description: Construction start date in ISO 8601 format.

completion_date.description: Expected completion date in ISO 8601 format.

location.description: Geographic hierarchy and coordinates of the property.

country.description: Country where the property is located.

city.description: City where the property is located.

sub_community.description: Smaller subdivision within the community (if applicable).

coordinates.description: Latitude and longitude for map display.

licenses.description: Regulatory licenses held by the agency.

agent.description: Individual agent details for this listing.

is_tru_broker.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly responsive and advertise genuine properties.

proxy_phone.description: Proxy phone number for privacy (if available).

media.description: Photos and videos associated with the property.

is_verified.description: Property verification flag - Bayut has checked this property's documentation to ensure its authenticity.

truchecked_at.description: TruCheck timestamp - Having TruCheck‚Ñ¢ confirms that Bayut's quality control team has validated the Oqood (contracts) of this property.

permit_number.description: A permit issued to RERA registered companies and Dubai developers confirming their right to advertise properties.

location_purpose_tier.description: Tier based on location and purpose.

sale_type.description: Type of off-plan sale (new, resale, direct_from_developer).

count.description: Total number of listings matching the criteria.

get.description: Fetch comprehensive details for a single property listing by its unique ID. Includes pricing, specifications, location hierarchy, agency and agent info, media assets, verification, legal data, project details, amenities, floor plans, payment plans, and so on.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Property's unique identifier. (Get it from the property search results.)

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: Detailed property profile including specifications, media, and metadata.

title.example: Fully Furnished | Handover now | Great Layout

is_furnished.description: Flag indicating whether the property is furnished or unfurnished.

completion_status.description: Current construction status of the property (`under-construction` or `completed`).

description.example: Property Listing: 1-Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Al Serh Residences 11...
description.description: Detailed description of the property (in English).

description_ar.example: ÿπŸÇÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™: ÿ¥ŸÇÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ŸÜŸàŸÖ Ÿàÿßÿ≠ÿØÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ®Ÿäÿπ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿµÿ±ÿ≠ ÿ±Ÿäÿ≤ŸäÿØŸÜÿ≥ÿ≤ 11...

media.description: Photos and videos associated with the property.

is_verified.description: Property verification flag - Bayut has checked this property's documentation to ensure its authenticity.

truchecked_at.description: TruCheck timestamp (Having TruCheck‚Ñ¢ confirms that Bayut's quality control team has validated the Oqood (contracts) of this property).

permit_number.description: A permit issued to RERA registered companies and Dubai developers confirming their right to advertise properties.

location_purpose_tier.description: Tier based on location and purpose.

amenities.description: List of grouped amenities with localization.

name.example: Al Serh Residences 11 By Asak Real Estate Development

total_building_area.description: Total built-up area of the building (in sqft).

get.description:
Returns a list of real estate agencies that operate in specified locations within the UAE.

**Note:** Agencies listed here may not be based in the location but have listed properties in that area.

parameters.name: locations_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of location IDs to filter agencies by service areas. Get these IDs from the "Locations Search" endpoint.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination index (starting from 0).

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of preferred language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: A list of real estate agencies serving the requested locations.

results.description: List of agencies matching the given location filters.

agents_count.description: Number of agents associated with the agency.

product.description: Type of product subscription the agency has.

logo.description: URL to the agency's logo image.

base_location.description: Main location where the agency is based or prominently operates.

number.description: License number issued by the authority.

phone_numbers.description: Contact phone numbers for the agency.

base_locations.description: Locations where the agency is based or prominently operates.

contact_methods.description: Available communication channels with the agency.

created_at.description: Date the agency was added to the platform.

stats.description: Statistical data and coverage information for the agency.

categories.description: Property types the agency deals in.

categories_ar.description: Property types the agency deals in (in Arabic).

service_areas_ar.description: Names of the service areas (in Arabic).

purposes.description: Intent of property listings (e.g., for-sale, for-rent).

properties_sale_count.description: Number of properties listed for sale.

properties_rent_count.description: Number of properties listed for rent.

agents.description: List of agents working with the agency.

is_featured.description: Whether the agency is marked as featured.

locations_ids.description: List of location IDs used in the request.

get.description: Returns a list of real estate agencies whose names match the specified query string.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for agency names.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination index (starting from 0).

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of preferred language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: A paginated list of agencies matching the search query.

results.description: Array of agencies whose names match the given query.

agents_count.description: Total number of agents registered under this agency.

product.description: Subscription tier or product type associated with the agency.

logo.description: URL pointing to the agency's logo image.

base_location.description: Place where the agency is based.

base_location_ar.description: Place where the agency is based (in Arabic).

licenses.description: Regulatory licenses held by the agency.

number.description: Official license number issued by the authority.

authority.description: Name of the licensing authority (e.g., DED, RERA).

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphen-separated, URL-friendly identified for the agency.

base_locations.description: Locations where the agency is based or prominently operates.

full.description: Full hierarchical path of the location (in English).

full_ar.description: Full hierarchical path of the location (in Arabic).

contact_methods.description: Supported contact channels (e.g., SMS, email, call).

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the agency was registered on the platform.

stats.description: Aggregated statistics and coverage details for the agency.

categories.description: Property types that the agency deals with.

categories_ar.description: Property types that the agency deals with (in Arabic).

service_areas.description: Service areas covered by the agency (in English).

service_areas_ar.description: Service areas covered by the agency (in Arabic).

properties_sale_count.description: Total count of properties the agency has listed for sale.

properties_rent_count.description: Total count of properties the agency has listed for rent.

properties_total_count.description: Combined total of sale and rental property listings.

agents.description: Detailed list of agents working under this agency.

name_ar.description: Agent's full name (in Arabic, if available).

brn_number.description: Broker Registration Number associated with the agent.

bln_number.description: Business License Number linked to the agent.

language_codes.description: Supported languages for communications and listing details.

speciality_codes.description: Codes indicating the agency's areas of specialization.

is_featured.description: Flag indicating if the agency is featured or not.

agency_sg.description: Internal scoring metric representing agency's ranking or status.

count.description: Total number of agencies found matching the query.

page.description: Current pagination index returned in the response.

get.description: Fetch comprehensive details for a single real estate agency by its unique ID. Includes description, contact information, licensing, activity statistics, and more.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Agency's unique identifier.

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

agents_count.description: Total number of agents associated with this agency.

product.description: Subscription tier or service package of the agency.

logo.description: URL pointing to the agency's official logo image.

base_location.description: Place where the agency is based or prominently operates.

base_location_ru.description: Place where the agency is based or prominently operates (in Russian).

contact_methods.description: Supported communication channels (SMS, email, call, etc.).

description.example:
An accredited, registered, and licensed real estate company established by K A HOMES
As a leading company in the United Arab Emirates with its renewed style in real estate activity in the field of marketing and selling real estate throughout the United Arab Emirates. The company has taken great strides in its endeavor to diversify its sales field by making customers one of its top priorities in its business and then proceeding to create services according to their needs.
description.description: Description summarizing the agency's background and expertise (in English).

description_ru.example:
An accredited, registered, and licensed real estate company established by K A HOMES
As a leading company in the United Arab Emirates with its renewed style in real estate activity in the field of marketing and selling real estate throughout the United Arab Emirates. The company has taken great strides in its endeavor to diversify its sales field by making customers one of its top priorities in its business and then proceeding to create services according to their needs.
description_ru.description: Description summarizing the agency's background and expertise (in Russian, if available).

is_featured.description: Indicates whether the agency is featured or not.

licenses.description: List of official licenses held by the agency.

number.description: Official license number issued by the regulatory authority.

authority.description: Name of the licensing authority (e.g., DED, RERA).

base_locations.description: Locations where the agency is based or prominently operates.

full.description: Full hierarchical path of the location (in English).

full_ru.description: Full hierarchical path of the location (in Russian).

stats.description: Aggregated statistics and coverage metrics for the agency.

categories.description: List of property categories the agency specializes in.

category_types_ru.description: List of property categories the agency specializes in (in Russian).

service_areas.description: Places where the agency serves (in English).

service_areas_ru.description: Places where the agency serves (in Russian).

properties_sale_count.description: Total number of properties listed for sale by the agency.

properties_rent_count.description: Total number of properties listed for rent by the agency.

properties_total_count.description: Combined total of sale and rental property listings.

get.description: Returns a list of real estate developers whose names match the given search query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query to filter developer names.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination index (starting from 0).

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: Returns developers matching the search criteria.

results.description: Array of developer objects matching the search query.

name_ar.description: Name of the developer (in Arabic, if available).

name_ru.description: Name of the developer (in Russian, if available).

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphenated, URL-friendly identifier for the developer.

contact_methods.description: Supported communication channels (e.g., email, call) for contact.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the developer profile was added to the platform.

stats.description: Aggregated statistics and coverage details for the developer's listings.

categories.description: List of property categories that the developer offers (in English).

categories_ar.description: List of property categories that the developer offers (in Arabic).

categories_ru.description: List of property categories that the developer offers (in Russian).

service_areas.description: Places where the developer operates (in English).

service_areas_ar.description: Places where the developer operates (in Arabic).

service_areas_ru.description: Places where the developer operates (in Russian).

purposes.description: Intent of property listings (e.g., for-sale, for-rent).

properties_sale_count.description: Total number of properties listed for sale by the developer.

properties_rent_count.description: Total number of properties listed for rent by the developer.

properties_total_count.description: Combined total of sale and rented properties.

count.description: Total number of developers found that match the search criteria.

query.description: Given search query used to filter developers.

get.description: Returns a list of real estate agents whose names match the specified search query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query to filter agent names.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination index (starting from 0).

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: List of agents matching the search query.

results.description: Array of agent profiles matching the query.

name_ar.description: Agent's full name (in Arabic, if available).

about_user.example: A visionary CEO of one of the top Real Estate agencies in the region...
about_user.description: Bio summarizing the agent's background, expertise, and values.

about_user_ar.example: A visionary CEO of one of the top Real Estate agencies in the region...
about_user_ar.description: Bio summarizing the agent's background, expertise, and values (in Arabic, if available).

agency.description: Agency details associated with the agent.

licenses.description: List of regulatory licenses held by the agency.

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphenated, URL-friendly identifier for the agency.

proxy_phone.description: Masked or proxy phone for privacy (if available).

avg_star_rating.description: Average rating based on client feedback.

contact_methods.description: Supported channels to reach the agent.

total_count.description: Total properties managed by the agent.

check_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Bayut has checked this property's documentation to ensure its authenticity).

trucheck_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Listings with the TruCheck‚Ñ¢ badge have been validated as authentic and available by Bayut's team).

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphenated, URL-friendly identifier for the agent.

service_areas.description: Places where the agent serves (in English).

service_areas_ar.description: Places where the agent serves (in Arabic).

user_langs.description: Languages spoken by the agent (in English).

user_langs_ar.description: Languages spoken by the agent (in Arabic).

language_codes.description: Languages spoken by the agent (ISO codes).

is_tru_broker.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly responsive and advertise genuine properties.

total_xp.description: Total experience points earned based on performance.

is_highly_responsive.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly reachable and responsive.

is_quality_lister.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who authenticate their listings using TruCheck‚Ñ¢.

has_badges.description: Whether the agent has earned platform badges or awards.

active_in_emirate.description: Primary emirate where the agent is currently active.

leaderboard_filters.description: Filters used to rank the agent on public leaderboards.

location.description: Path of the agent's main service location.

category.description: Property category used for leaderboard filtering.

count.description: Total number of agents found matching the query.

query.description: The search string used to filter agent names.

get.description: Get a list of real estate agents filtered by locations IDs, listing purpose, and property category.

parameters.name: locations_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of location IDs to filter agents by service areas.

parameters.name: purpose
parameters.description: Listing intent to filter agents (e.g., `for-sale`, `for-rent`).

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Property category code to filter agents (e.g., `residential`, `commercial`, `short_term_residential`, `long_term_residential`).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination index (starts from 0).

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: Filtered list of agents matching the criteria.

about_user.example:
Mr. Mohammed Bashid Patel is a dedicated and experienced real estate agent
with a strong passion for helping clients find their ideal properties...
about_user.description: Bio summarizing the agent's expertise (in English).

about_user_ar.example:
Mr. Mohammed Bashid Patel is a dedicated and experienced real estate agent
with a strong passion for helping clients find their ideal properties...
about_user_ar.description: Bio summarizing the agent's expertise (in Arabic, if available).

check_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Bayut has checked this property's documentation to ensure its authenticity).

trucheck_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Listings with the TruCheck‚Ñ¢ badge have been validated as authentic and available by Bayut's team).

service_areas_ar.description: Name of service areas (in Arabic, if available).

speciality_codes.description: Agent's expertise areas (in English, as codes).

user_langs.description: Languages spoken by the Agent (in English).

user_langs_ar.description: Languages spoken by the Agent (in Arabic).

language_codes.description: Language codes spoken by the Agent (in ISO codes).

is_tru_broker.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly responsive and advertise genuine properties.

is_highly_responsive.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly reachable and responsive.

is_quality_lister.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who authenticate their listings using TruCheck‚Ñ¢.

count.description: Total number of agents matching filters.

locations_ids.description: Location IDs used in the request.

purpose.description: Purpose filter used in the request.

category.description: Category filter used in the request.

get.description:
Returns a list of all agents affiliated with a specific real estate agency in UAE.

Includes detailed profiles, contact information, performance statistics, and more.

parameters.name: agency_id
parameters.description: Agency's unique identifier whose agents will be listed.

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

200.description: List of agents belonging to the specified agency.

results.description: Array of agent profiles associated with the agency.

about_user.example: UAE properties consultant, I hope to help you find your dream home...
about_user.description: Bio summarizing the agent's expertise and background (in English).

about_user_ar.example: UAE properties consultant, I hope to help you find your dream home...
about_user_ar.description: Bio summarizing the agent's expertise and background (in Arabic).

experience.description: Years of professional real estate experience.

home_country.description: Country where the agent belongs (in English).

home_country_ar.description: Country where the agent belongs (in Arabic).

avg_star_rating.description: Average star rating from client reviews.

contact_methods.description: Supported channels to reach the agent.

check_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Bayut has checked this property's documentation to ensure its authenticity).

trucheck_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Listings with the TruCheck‚Ñ¢ badge have been validated as authentic and available by Bayut's team).

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphenated, URL-friendly identifier slug for the agent.

service_areas.description: Names of service areas covered by the agent (in English).

service_areas_ar.description: Names of service areas covered by the agent (in Arabic).

user_langs.description: Languages spoken by the agent (in English).

user_langs_ar.description: Languages spoken by the agent (in Arabic).

is_tru_broker.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly responsive and advertise genuine properties.

is_highly_responsive.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly reachable and responsive.

is_quality_lister.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who authenticate their listings using TruCheck‚Ñ¢.

has_badges.description: Whether the agent has earned platform badges.

active_in_emirate.description: Primary emirate where the agent is active.

top_agent.description: Denotes if the agent is a top-performer.

count.description: Total number of agents in the agency.

get.description:
Returns information related to a single real estate agent by their unique ID.

Includes personal bio, experience, contact details, agency affiliation, performance statistics, and more.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent to retrieve.

parameters.name: langs
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of language codes (`en`, `ar`, `ru`, `zh`).

name_ar.description: Agent's full name (in Arabic, if available).

about_user.example: I am a highly knowledgeable and reliable professional in the real estate industry, particularly in the short term rental sector. I understand the importance of providing quality services and focuses on having a comprehensive understanding of the areas and projects I deals with. By prioritizing quality over quantity, I stay up-to-date with the latest trends, market conditions, and legal requirements in the real estate industry. This enables me to offer reliable advice that aligns with my clients' goals and needs. With my commitment to honesty, customer service, and expertise, I can be a trusted partner in your search for a home or investment property
about_user.description: Agent's bio summarizing their expertise and background.

about_user_ar.example: I am a highly knowledgeable and reliable professional in the real estate industry, particularly in the short term rental sector. I understand the importance of providing quality services and focuses on having a comprehensive understanding of the areas and projects I deals with. By prioritizing quality over quantity, I stay up-to-date with the latest trends, market conditions, and legal requirements in the real estate industry. This enables me to offer reliable advice that aligns with my clients' goals and needs. With my commitment to honesty, customer service, and expertise, I can be a trusted partner in your search for a home or investment property
about_user_ar.description: Agent's bio summarizing their expertise and background (in Arabic, if available).

experience.description: Number of years of professional real estate experience.

home_country.description: Country where the agent belongs (in English).

home_country_ar.description: Country where the agent belongs (in Arabic).

agency.description: Agency where the agent is associated with.

id.description: Unique identifier of the agency the agent is affiliated with.

licenses.description: List of regulatory licenses held by the agency.

number.description: Official license number issued by the authority.

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphen-separated, URL-friendly identifier for the agency.

proxy_phone.description: Masked or proxy phone number for privacy.

avg_star_rating.description: Average star rating based on client reviews.

contact_methods.description: Supported communication channels for contacting the agent.

whatsapp.description: WhatsApp number for direct messaging, if available.

proxy_phone.description: Masked phone number for privacy, if available.

proxy_mobile.description: Masked mobile number for privacy, if available.

proxy_whatsapp.description: Masked WhatsApp number for anonymized contact.

social_media.description: Links to the agent's social media profiles.

stats.description: Performance and listing statistics for the agent.

total_count.description: Total number of properties the agent has handled.

rent_count.description: Number of properties rented by the agent.

sale_count.description: Number of properties sold by the agent.

check_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Bayut has checked this property's documentation to ensure its authenticity).

trucheck_count.description: Number of verified properties (That is, Listings with the TruCheck‚Ñ¢ badge have been validated as authentic and available by Bayut's team).

review_count.description: Total number of client reviews received by the agent.

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphen-separated, URL-friendly identifier for agent.

brn_number.description: Broker Registration Number for the agent, if available.

bln_number.description: Business License Number for the agent, if available.

service_areas.description: Places where the agent operates (in English).

service_areas_ar.description: Places where the agent operates (in Arabic).

user_langs.description: Languages spoken by the agent (in English).

user_langs_ar.description: Languages spoken by the agent (in Arabic).

is_tru_broker.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly responsive and advertise genuine properties.

total_xp.description: Total experience points accumulated by the agent based on performance and reviews.

is_highly_responsive.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who are highly reachable and responsive.

is_quality_lister.description: Exclusive badge awarded to agents who authenticate their listings using TruCheck‚Ñ¢.

has_badges.description: Indicates whether the agent has earned any badges or awards.

active_in_emirate.description: Primary emirate where the agent is currently active.

is_profile_completed.description: Indicates if the agent's profile is fully completed with all required details.

is_complete.description: Boolean flag confirming completeness of the agent's account setup.

top_agent.description: Indicates if the agent is ranked among the platform's top performers.

leaderboard_filters.description: Filters used to categorize the agent on public leaderboards.

location.description: Breadcrumb-style path indicating the agent's primary service location.

category.description: Property category used for leaderboard filtering.

purpose.description: Listing purpose used for leaderboard filtering.

completion_status.description: Indicates whether the leaderboard filter requires listings to be complete or any status.

post.description: Fetch Dubai's Real Estate Transactions based on custom filters like location, category, price, area, date range, and more.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination index (starting from 0).

locations_ids.description: List of location IDs to filter by. (Must belong to Dubai)

sort_by.description: Field by which to sort the results (e.g., `date`, `amount`, `rent`, `builtup_area`, `plot_area`, `beds`, `duration`).

order.description: Sort order (`asc` for ascending or `desc` for descending).

200.description: A list of real estate transactions matching the filters.

property.description: Details about the property involved in the transaction.

full_location.example: Dubai Marina -> Marina Diamonds -> Marina Diamond 2

agent_id.description: Agent ID associated with the transaction.

contract.description: Details of the contract (for rental transactions).

contract_type.description: Type of contract (New, Renewal or Unknown).

count.description: Total number of results on the current page.

get.description: Returns a list of amenities that match the search query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search term for filtering amenities

200.description: Returns a list of matching amenities.

results.description: List of amenities that match the provided search query.

count.description: Total number of amenities matching the search query.

get.description:
Returns either a list of floorplans or a list of child locations containing floorplans based on the provided `location_slug`.
- If the location is very specific (e.g., a building), the `floorplans` list is filled and `child_locations` is empty.
- If the location is high-level (e.g., a neighborhood), the `child_locations` list is filled and `floorplans` is empty.

Useful for retrieving detailed architectural layouts of properties.

parameters.name: location_slug
parameters.description: Location slug (path-like string) identifying the area or building.

child_locations.description: List of child locations that have floorplans.

floorplans_count.description: Number of floorplans available for this child location.

floorplans.description: List of available floorplans for the given location.

beds.description: Number of bedrooms in the floorplan.

baths.description: Number of bathrooms in the floorplan.

2d_imgs.description: List of 2D images of the floorplan.

3d_imgs.description: List of 3D images of the floorplan.

models.description: List of 3D model links for the floorplan.

get.description:
This endpoint delivers a property intelligence report combining current 
property details, comparable sales & rentals, AI-driven value estimates (TruEstimate/TruValue), 
and historical price trends to help users evaluate a property's true market 
position.

**Note:** Exactly **one identifier option** must be provided in query parameters:

- `location_id` + `unit_number`  
- `title_deed` + `year` + `property_type`  
- `oqood` + `year` + `property_type`  
- `dewa`  

If multiple identifiers are provided, the request will return `400 Bad Request`.

Property type defaults to "unit" if not provided or invalid.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Location ID of the property building.

parameters.name: unit_number
parameters.description: Unit number within the building/location.

parameters.name: title_deed
parameters.description: Title deed number of the property.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year of the Title Deed or Oqood.

parameters.name: property_type
parameters.description: Property type - to be passed with title_deed or oqood. Defaults to "unit" if not provided or invalid.

parameters.name: oqood
parameters.description: Oqood number of the property.

parameters.name: dewa
parameters.description: DEWA number of the property.

200.description:
Returns a comprehensive property intelligence report including:  
- Property details (bedrooms, area, type, community, etc.)
- Comparable sales and rentals from similar properties
- TruEstimate valuations for both sale and rental
- Two-year price trend data

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the property

total_area_sqft.description: Total area of the property in square feet

community.description: Community name where the property is located

sold.description: List of similar properties that were sold

price.description: Sale price of the comparable property

community_name.description: Community name of the comparable property

rented.description: List of similar properties that were rented

rent_price.description: Rental price of the comparable property

transaction_date.description: Date when the rental contract was signed

community_name.description: Community name of the comparable property

contract_duration_months.description: Duration of the rental contract in months

min_price.description: Minimum price in the trend range

max_price.description: Maximum price in the trend range

2y_trend.description:
Two-year historical price trend data. 
Object with date strings as keys and price values.
Contains the last 24 months of data.
